segments.text: I'm watching two children near a set of kitchen cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is attempting to reach something high up, a cookie jar I think.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, almost as if it's about to tip over backwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes me feel very anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already inside the jar, grabbing cookies, while the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm raised, clearly hoping for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both completely focused on their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope that stool doesn't give way beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a dangerous game they're playing for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their coordinated effort is quite impressive, actually.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the potential fall is just making me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would intervene before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
